properties.Name_of_th: At the end of the Meegaha Ella village
properties.Observatio: The   Existing water tank is .constructed (1.2m x 1.5m x 1.0m, L*W*H) and drinking water is distributed. But  no fitersystem with water tank
properties.Descriptio:
Introducing a suitable filtering system to the tank

Supplying & laying 63mm Dia PVC pipe line in solvent socket type in PN-11 rate including socket, solvent cement, etc.

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%

properties.Observatio: There is a 4.5mx4.5mx2.0m(LxWxH)tank. Water is taken for   drinking. Tank wall has collapsed and water leaking .
properties.Descriptio:
Removing collapsed parts, removing debris & clearing the site

1:3:6 (40mm) concrete manual mix (volume batching) for collapsed wall

Construction of curtain wall (0.075mm thk) with 1:2:4 (3/4") concrete, 1/2" dowels at 600mm x 600mm intervals and embedd

Drilling of tube well (5m deep) with supplying and fixing of 0.5 HP x 4" Dia tube well pump including all necessary connections and constructing a protective cell for the pump and mounting the same to good working order

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%

properties.Observatio: The  Water tank is constructed 2.4m x 2.4m x 1.2m, L*W*H)But the water is leaking. A tank is Located on a public land. Used for drinking and bathing
properties.Descriptio:
Scarifying existing rock or concrete surface

Plaster 12mm thick in 1:3 cement and sand finished smooth with Gray cement floating

1:3:6 (40mm) concrete manual mix (volume batching) for tank bottom

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%

Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid

Miscellaneous
